description: A unique operational configuration of a trusted platform on a network.

domain.description: Operating industry domain that this subscriber offers its products or services in. A single subscriber can operate in multiple domains. Each operating domain must have a unique subscriber object entry in the req

location.description: The region of operation of this subscriber

subscriber_id.description: A globally unique identifier of the platform, Typically it is the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the platform.

type.description: The role of subscriber on the network

url.description: The callback URL of the Subscriber. This should necessarily contain the same domain name as set in `subscriber_id``.
